___businessPremisesRenovationAllowance.description: Allowance for renovation or conversion of derelict business properties. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99
___businessPremisesRenovationAllowance.title: Other Capital allowance

___propertyAllowance.description: The limited amount Tax exemption for individuals with income from land or property. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99
___propertyAllowance.title: Other Capital allowance

___annualInvestmentAllowance.description: Can be claimed on equipment bought (except cars) up to maximum annual amount. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99
___annualInvestmentAllowance.title: Annual investment allowance

___otherCapitalAllowance.description: All other capital allowances. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99
___otherCapitalAllowance.title: Other Capital allowance

___bpraBalancingCharge.description: Income from the sale or grant of a long lease for a premium of renovated business premises within 7 years of first use. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99
___bpraBalancingCharge.title: bpraBalancing charge

___periodOfGraceAdjustment.description: Identifies a property which didn't qualify for FHL this year but qualified the year previous
___periodOfGraceAdjustment.title: Period of grace adjustment

___balancingCharge.description: If an item for which capital allowance was claimed has been sold, given away or is no longer in use. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99
___balancingCharge.title: Balancing charge

___lossBroughtForward.description: Loss brought forward from earlier years. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99
___lossBroughtForward.title: Loss brought forward

___privateUseAdjustment.description: Any expenses incurred not solely for the property business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99
___privateUseAdjustment.title: Private use adjustment

___nonResidentLandlord.description: An explicit declaration that the user is a Non-Resident Landlord. The default is FALSE
___nonResidentLandlord.title: Non Resident Landlord

___rarJointLet.description: A notification that the Rent A Room income (RAR) is shared with another individual.
___rarJointLet.title: Other Capital allowance
